title: sArum aDiyAriDar
sahitya:
sArum aDiyAriDar tIrap-parandOm arupaDai vIDuDaiya ArumukhattOnai


anupallavi

  kOrum varattai vArik-koDuttiDum varadanai Eru mayil vAhananai ezhil mighu mOhananai


caraNam    vIra vaDivEluDanE viNNavar sirai mILa sUra padumanaip-pOril samhAram sheidavanai
pArengumE pugazh pongit-tigazhvOnai vEru iNaiyillAt-tuNai tanait-taruvOnai
